constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 75 (Friday, April 30, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KIND:
H.R. 2927.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 7, Clause 1
``All Bills for raising Revenue shall originate in the
House of Representatives''
[Page H2135]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Education and Labor, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: SAVE Act of 2021
